info.title: Schema of Azure VMware Solution events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure VMware Solution events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

SddcUpdatingEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.SddcUpdating event.

SddcUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.SddcUpdated event.

SddcFailedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.SddcFailed event.

ClusterCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ClusterCreated event.

ClusterDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ClusterDeleted event.

ClusterUpdatingEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ClusterUpdating event.

ClusterUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ClusterUpdated event.

ClusterFailedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ClusterFailed event.

DatastoreCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.DatastoreCreated event.

DatastoreDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.DatastoreDeleted event.

DatastoreUpdatingEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.DatastoreUpdating event.

DatastoreUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.DatastoreUpdated event.

DatastoreFailedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.DatastoreFailed event.

ScriptExecutionStartedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ScriptExecutionStarted event.

ScriptExecutionFinishedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ScriptExecutionFinished event.

namedOutputs.description: Named outputs of completed execution, if any.

ScriptExecutionCancelledEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ScriptExecutionCancelled event.

ScriptExecutionFailedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AVS.ScriptExecutionFailed event.

SddcEventProperties.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for Microsoft.AVS/privateClouds events.

operationId.description: Id of the operation that caused this event.

ClusterEventProperties.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for Microsoft.AVS/clusters events.

operationId.description: Id of the operation that caused this event.

added.description: Hosts added to the cluster in this event, if any.

removed.description: Hosts removed to the cluster in this event, if any.

maintenance.description: Hosts in Maintenance mode in the cluster, if any.

DatastoreEventProperties.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for Microsoft.AVS/datastores events.

operationId.description: Id of the operation that caused this event.

ScriptExecutionEventProperties.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for Microsoft.AVS/scriptExecutions events.

operationId.description: Id of the operation that caused this event.

cmdletId.description: Cmdlet referenced in the execution that caused this event.

output.description: Stdout outputs from the execution, if any.
